H5804.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4519.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H8590.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, west of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Kohath<SDBH:קְהָת>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H4023.def: = town; ◄ located to the southwest of Valley of {L:Jizreel<SDBH:יִזְרְעֶאל>}, territory of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► former {L:Canaanite<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנִי>} kingdom; location where king {L:Josiah<SDBH:יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ>} of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} was killed during his battle with Pharaoh {L:Neco<SDBH:נְכֹה>}

H3130.def: = man; ◄ eleventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► father of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>} and {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, each founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H836.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Zilpah<SDBH:זִלְפָּה>}, slave of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3232.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}, son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► founder of clan of יִמְנָה Imnites

H269.def: = daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

21.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H2268.def: = state of being associated with other people for a common purpose

H4439.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beriah<SDBH:בְּרִיעָה>}; tribe of {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}; ► father of {L:Birzaith<SDBH:בִּרְזָיִת>}

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H2268.def: = state of being associated with other people for a common purpose

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7763.def: = man; ◄ father of {L:Jehozabad<SDBH:יְהֹוזָבָד>}, official, time of {L:Joash<SDBH:יֹואָשׁ>}

H2369.def: = engraved object; ◄ made out of metal; ► used to make a mark denoting ownership, approval, or closure of something (normally done by pressing into clay or heated wax and usually attached to a document or letter); sometimes worn on a chain around the neck, or in the form of a ring on one's hand; ≈ regarded as valuable and associated with exclusivity

H269.def: = daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H1118.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Japhlet<SDBH:יַפְלֵט>}; of the tribe of {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H8106.def: = sediments of {L:wine<SDBH:יַיִן>} left in a container; ≈ the image of wine resting on its dregs is often used to denote an attitude of complacency

H758.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as the founder of a land and ethnic group with the same name

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H6690.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Helem<SDBH:הֵלֶם>}; tribe of {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}; ► warrior and family head
= man; ◄ son of {L:Helem<SDBH:הֵלֶם>}; tribe of {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}; ► warrior and family head

H7777.def: = animal that looks like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; ≈ associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self-important

H1936.def: = state in which humans, deities, animals and plants are respected by others, implying beauty, vigor and authority

H8037.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Agee<SDBH:אָגֵא>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3500.def: = what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects

H2592.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ephod<SDBH:אֵפֹד>}; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► chief

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H836.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Zilpah<SDBH:זִלְפָּה>}, slave of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1305.def: = action by which someone carefully examines a group of objects in order to determine whether they meet certain criteria

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H4557.def: = an oral or written account of something

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H3187.def: = process by which someone's name is put in a family register

H8337.def: = state in which a countable entity is six in number

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing
